revisions.rev:
{{cleanup|date=July 2011}} '''[[Disney Junior]]''' is a programming block on [[Disney Channel (international)|Disney Channel]] or independent channel that is broadcast in many different countries and regions. The Disney Junior brand, currently existing as 22 channels or blocks in 156 countries and territories, is formely [[Playhouse Disney]]. <ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.c21media.net/resources/detail.asp?area=79&article=55780|title=Disney Junior to replace SoapNet, Playhouse|publisher=C21Media|date=2010-05-26}}</ref>
==[[Africa]]== {{main|Disney Channel (Southern Africa)}} ''Playhouse Disney'' has launched in Africa. June 1 2011 Disney Junior replaced by Playhouse Disney
==[[Asia Pacific]]== ===[[Asia]]=== {{Main|Disney Junior (Asia)}} '''Disney Junior''' in [[Asia]] was launched in [[2011]]. The [[Television program|programs]] are similar to the Disney Junior in the [[United States|United States of America]]. However the channel may also carry some non-Disney programming like [[Clifford the Big Red Dog]], and [[Harry and His Bucket Full of Dinosaurs]]. Programming on the channel is uninterrupted by commercials. Disney Junior is available on [[SkyCable]] channel 38, [[Global Destiny Cable]], [[Cablelink]] and selected cable affiliates nationwide in the [[Philippines]], [[Astro (Malaysian satellite television)|Astro]] in Malaysia, [[Indovision]], [[First Media]] and [[Astro Nusantara]] in Indonesia and [[StarHub TV]] in Singapore.
===[[Hong Kong]]=== Disney Junior Hong kong channel now available chinese & english Cable TV Hong Kong Hong Kong Channel 136 now TV Hong Kong Channel 442 Disney Junior On Disney Channel 8am
===[[India]]=== {{main|Disney Junior (India)}}
===[[Japan]]=== In Japan Disney Junior is a programming block from weekday 7:30am to 2:30pm And as Weekend 7:30pm to 10:00am
===[[Taiwan]]=== In Taiwan Disney Junior is a programming block from 8am to 2pm on weekday, and 7am to 9am on weekend. Disney Junior block on disney channel launched in September 1, 2011. Playhouse Disney block on Disney Channel was closed in June 2011, followed by summer special.
===[[Australia]] and [[New Zealand]]=== {{main|Disney Junior (Australia and New Zealand)}}
===[[Philippines]]=== Disney Junior Asia philippines channel now available Tagalog Visayas & english
SkyCable Philippines Channel 38 Cablelink Philippines Channel 29 Global Destiny Cable Philippines Channel 49 Cignal Digital TV Philippines Channel 35 Parasat Cable TV Philippines Channel 50 Bohol Cable tv philippines Channel 35 & channel 40 TV5 Kids Presents Disney Clubhouse Every day 8:00am
==[[Arab World]]== Playhouse Disney broadcasts as a television block on [[Disney Channel Middle East]], and it's called ''[[Playhouse Disney Morning]]''.
Playhouse Disney is also an Arabian TV channel, but closes at 8pm for [[KidsCo]].
June 1 2011 Disney Junior replaces Playhouse Disney.
==Europe== === [[Netherlands]] & [[Flanders (country)|Flanders]] === Disney Junior will launch on September 1, 2011 and will replace The Playhouse Disney block on Disney Channel. The Disney Junior TV Channel will replace the Playhouse Disney TV Channel on September 10, 2011
{{main|Disney Junior (Netherlands/Flanders)}}
===[[Central and Eastern Europe]]=== Disney Junior in [[Central and Eastern Europe]] was launched on the same day as [[Disney Channel (Central and Eastern Europe)]], as Playhouse Disney on September 19, 2009. It was launched as Disney Junior on June 1, 2011.
===[[France]]=== {{main|Playhouse Disney (France)}} {{main|Disney Junior (France)}} The channel was launched on November 2, 2002.
===[[Germany]]=== In Germany the channel was launched in 2004.
===[[Greece]]=== {{main|Playhouse Disney (Greece)}} {{main|Disney Junior (Greece)}} Playhouse Disney was launched as a morning block on [[Disney Channel Greece]]. June 1, 2011 it was rebranded as Disney Junior.
=== [[Israel]] === {{main|Disney Junior (Israel)}}
Disney Junior launched on July 18, 2011 on [[Yes (Israel)|YES]].
===[[Italy]]=== Playhouse Disney was launched on May 1, 2006, broadcasting everyday showing many of the same shows the US looks. On May 14, 2011, it was replaced by Disney Junior.
===[[Poland]]=== {{main|Disney Junior Poland}}
Playhouse Disney was launched in December 2006 as a block on [[Disney Channel Poland]]. Also, on August 1, 2010 it replaced [[Jetix Play]]. As of June 2011, it was rebranded as [[Disney Junior]].
===[[Portugal]]=== Playhouse Disney Portugal was launched as a block on September 8, 2007 on [[Disney Channel (international)#Portugal|Disney Channel Portugal]].
===[[Romania]]=== {{main|Disney Junior (Romania)}} It broadcasts as a television block on [[Disney Channel Romania]] it's called Playhouse Disney on Disney Channel.
===[[Russia]]=== Playhouse Disney ({{lang-ru|âÐ£Ð·Ð½Ð°Ð²Ð°Ð¹ÐºÐ° Disneyâ}}) was launched on August 12, 2010 as a block on [[Disney Channel Russia]]. in 2012 Disney Junior on [[Disney Channel Russia]] replaced by Playhouse Disney on disney junior
===[[Kazakhstan]]=== Playhouse Disney was launched on August 13, 2010 as a block on [[Disney Channel (Central and Eastern Europe)|Disney Channel Kazakhstan]], in December 31, 2011 by replaced on Disney Junior on Disney Channel.
===[[Scandinavia]]=== {{main|Disney Junior (Scandinavia)}}
===[[Spain]]=== Playhouse Disney was launched on December 25, 2002. Broadcasts shows such as Guess with Jess, Caillou, and Nelly and Caesar. It was replaced by [[Disney Junior]] on June 1, 2011.
===[[Turkey]]=== Playhouse Disney was launched in April 2007 as a block on [[Disney Channel Turkey]]. on September 1, 2010, it started as a TV channel.
===[[UK]] and [[Ireland]]=== {{main|Disney Junior (UK & Ireland)}} Playhouse Disney was launched on September 29, 2000. It was rebranded as Disney Junior on May 7, 2011.
==Americas== ===[[Canada]]=== ''Main articles: [[Disney Junior (Canadian English TV channel)]] and [[Disney Junior (Canadian French TV channel)]]''
An English-language Canadian version launched on November 30, 2007 as a [[Multiplexing|multiplex]] channel of [[Family (TV channel)|Family]].It is also a programming block on Family which airs from 4:30am to 7:00am,and from 8:45 to 11:00am on weekdays. It also airs from 4:30am to 8:00am on weekends. A French-language Canadian version, [[Playhouse Disney TÃ©lÃ©]], launched on July 5, 2010 under its own licence. These are the only Playhouse Disney channels in the world which are not owned by The Walt Disney Company due to CRTC restrictions; they are owned by [[Astral Media]] under license.Playhouse Disney Channel Canada,and Playhouse Disney Tele were rebranded as Disney Junior on May 6, 2011.
===[[Latin America]]===
{{main|Disney Junior (Latin America)}}
Disney Junior Latin America launched June 1, 2008, as '''Playhouse Disney Channel'''.<ref>http://www.ansa.it/ansalatina/notizie/rubriche/cultura/20080414145634633665.html</ref> It is also a programming block on the mornings of [[Disney Channel Latin America]], '''Disney Junior en Disney Channel'''. The programming is very similar to the version of the [[United States]]. It is broadcast in two feeds, ''North Zone'' and ''South Zone''. It was relaunched as Disney Junior on April 1, 2011.
===[[Brazil]]===
{{main|Disney Junior (Latin America)}}
Disney Junior is aired both on Disney Channel Brazil mornings (as '''Disney Junior no Disney Channel''') and its dedicated Disney Junior channel, launched in Brazil on September 5, 2008 as Playhouse Disney Channel, and relaunched as Disney Junior on April 9, 2011, & May 31, 2011
